basics.name: Michael Hui
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2022.

work.summary: Learning Assistant for the course ICS 111: Introduction to Computer Science I
highlights: Assisting students with questions regarding homework and course material
Leading a recitation class and assisting the students during open hours

work.company: UH Manoa Campus Center Ticket, Information & ID Office
work.summary: Helping students who have problems with ID's and meal plans
Interacting extensively with customers, taking order and serving food
highlights: Done cashier work and order taking to a great extent

awards.title: Hawaii B plus State Scholarship
awards.summary: available to undergraduate students who graduated from a State of Hawai'i public high school after 2005 and earned a cumulative grade point average of 3.0 or higher based on high school transcripts.

awards.title: 2019 McDonald's Regionals Scholarship Winner
awards.summary: This scholarship is awarded to senior high school students in Hawaii who have demonstrated good or above work capabilities at Mcdonald's. This scholarship is awareded to 10 people.
